ygData.subject: Re: Re: 3 questions
ygData.msgSnippet: It was I that posted the question, but alas, I am only 25 =(  Now that you mention it though, I am looking forward to that spot at 27 hehe! Weiland
ygData.messageBody:
It was I that posted the question, but alas, I am only 25 =( Now that you
mention it though, I am looking forward to that spot at 27 hehe!

Weiland
<Disciples of Truth>
Erollisi Marr



> From: Jason Rochelle <Jasroc@...>
>
> > 2) Where are Choon and Froon (I've spent the vast majority of my time
on the
> > East coast, so I'm not too familiar with the Karanas)? About what level
are
> > they? Is it possible to pull one without the other?
>
> Why would any bard over 27th ever want to pull just one of them? I
> killed them today and was thinking "This site was SPECIFICALLY designed
> for a bord of 27+ to solo, how wonderful!"
>
> Uldar Ulfangson
> 34th Bard, Rodcet Nife
